genopyc
genopyc
  • »
  • <no title>
  • View page source

Retrieve SNPs associated with an EFO trait.

Parameters: - efotrait (str): EFO id of the trait for which variants are to be retrieved (ex. EFO_0004994) - verbose (bool, optional): If True, the function returns the steps of variant retrieval - studyid (bool, optional): If True, the Id of the GWAS where the association was found is retrieved

Returns: - Pandas DataFrame: Variants associated with the trait
